news.title: Metasploit Penetration Testing Certification
news.description: Earned EC-Council Metasploit Pentesting certification (November 2025, ID: 448767). Advanced skills in vulnerability assessment and exploitation frameworks.

news.title: F1 Pit Strategy Predictor Project
news.description: Started development of deep learning system for Formula 1 pit stop prediction using Bidirectional LSTM with Multi-Head Attention. Achieving 93% AUC and 78% accuracy.

news.title: Network Hardening Planner Development
news.description: Launched AI-based automated planning system for network security hardening. Uses Unified Planning Library and Fast-Downward solver for optimal port management.

news.title: C|CT Certified Cybersecurity Technician
news.description: Achieved EC-Council C|CT certification (October 2025, ID: 440746). Demonstrating comprehensive knowledge in cybersecurity fundamentals and practices.

news.title: Environmental Sustainability Certification
news.description: Completed Environmental Sustainability and Digital Technologies course at Politecnico di Milano (September 2025).

news.title: Wireshark Network Troubleshooting
news.description: Earned Wireshark Network Troubleshooting certification from EC-Council (August 2025, ID: 447142).

news.title: Oracool Web Platform Launch
news.description: Completed full-stack sports prediction platform using Laravel, PHP, MySQL, and Bootstrap. Applied Agile methodology throughout development (April-July 2025).

news.title: TalentScope AI Project
news.description: Developed machine learning classification system for FIFA 2022 player potential prediction using ensemble models (May-June 2025).

news.title: Bachelor's Degree Completed

news.title: Master's Program Started
news.description: Began Master of Science in Computer Engineering at University of Brescia. Specializing in cybersecurity, systems administration, and AI.

news.title: Data Hiding Research
news.description: Completed research project on steganography techniques using CNNs and GANs (October 2024 - March 2025).

news.title: Blockchain Fundamentals Certification
